Troyes
item.comment: Troyes reminds me of Discworld Ankh Morpuk in the secret character power at the beginning of the game. It is a dice driven Euro with a small degree of control due to dice randomness and a high degree of player interaction (not quite reaching the interaction of Die Macher but close). Troyes has some of the dice manipulation of Alien Frontiers but where card abilities are shared instead. All in all a chaotic and random Euro with a difficult to manage but well put together game.
